title: Henry Liem Sell Shares of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk
body: Henry Liem, a shareholder of Argha Karya Prima Ind. Tbk (AKPI.JK), sold 500 shares of the company. The transaction, executed at IDR 580 per share on December 17, 2025, was for the purpose of selling shares. This reduced Henry Liem's total holding in AKPI.JK from 15,681,559 shares to 15,681,059 shares.

title: Garret Suryowijoyo Kartono Buy Shares of PT Maxindo Karya Anugerah Tbk
body: Garret Suryowijoyo Kartono acquired a net of 27,993,400 shares of PT Maxindo Karya Anugerah Tbk (MAXI.JK) for investment purposes. This transaction, which included a significant purchase at IDR 50.0 per share, establishes a new holding for Kartono, increasing his stake from 0 to 27,993,400 shares.
